body:
Just press "C" on your keyboard and it'll come up. Press esc to close it and go back to the world.

Took me way too long to implement (several hours) but it's a huge improvement over the previous system where you had to type R G or B and enter the color value between 000 and 255.
body_html:
Just press "C" on your keyboard and it'll come up. Press esc to close it and go back to the world.

Took me way too long to implement (several hours) but it's a huge improvement over the previous system where you had to type R G or B and enter the color value between 000 and 255.

guild.description: VoxelPlanet is a sandbox made out of colored cubes, using OpenGL and very basic shaders

guild.name: VoxelPlanet

title: VoxelPlanet now has a cube color picker!
